desc: Post the current number of patrons and total monthly earnings for the LRR patreon.
Post the latest video from the LRR video archive.
Post the latest podcast from the LRR podcast archive.
Post the latest broadcast from the LRR Twitch.tv channel.
Post the latest highlight from the LRR Twitch.tv channel.
Post the quotation with the specified ID.
Post a randomly selected quotation filtered by attribution.
Post the link to the quote database.
Add a quotation with optional attribution to the quotation database.
Remove the quotation with the specified ID from the quotation database.
Rate the quotation with the specified ID as either good or bad.
Post the link to Pump19's list of supported commands.
